00293   // -- Condition API
00298   template <typename F>
00299   ::dds::ReadCondition
00300   create_readcondition(const F& f)
00301   {
00302     return this->create_readcondition(f,
00303                                       DDS::NOT_READ_SAMPLE_STATE,
00304                                       DDS::ANY_VIEW_STATE,
00305                                       DDS::ALIVE_INSTANCE_STATE);
00306   }

00310   ::dds::ReadCondition
00311   create_readcondition(const F& f, 
00312                        dds::SampleStateMask sample_state, 
00313                        dds::ViewStateMask view_state, 
00314                        dds::InstanceStateMask instance_state)
00315   {
00316     return pimpl_->create_readcondition(f,sample_state, view_state, instance_state);
00317   }
